short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wefari makes your Google maps more sociable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is designed for those who love to share their local tips to friends and families (or even your fans) !

🚀 You can create a Wefari personal profile to let others follow your local tips without intruding your Google account.
🗺️Your followers can see all the recommendations as a overlay on Google Maps under your profile. (No more annoying Google maps lists crossover.)
📍Write your own description and activity duration about the places you are recommending.
💪 Friends can view your profile anywhere without login or download the app! 

Start sharing your local tips to your connections now!
